findings.title: ULTW - Transfers Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet.

findings.title: STC - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods should be checked if the result is successful.

findings.title: FSA - Fixed Swap Address
findings.description: The swap address is assigned once in the constructor and cannot be changed.

findings.title: CR - Code Repetition
findings.description: There are code segments that are repetitive in the contract.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external.

findings.title: L03 - Redundant Statements
findings.description: The contract contains statements that are not used and have no effect.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming convention.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of precision.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: The local variables have the same name from an upper scope.

findings.title: Centralized control by owner
findings.description: Functions that can be abused by the owner, allowing them to transfer funds to their wallet.
findings.location: WeMov contract, updateSwapTokensAtAmount, excludeFromMaxTransaction, updateSwapEnabled, updateFees, excludeFromFees, recoverETH functions.
